name: Elements Cubed DEMO
description:
Elements Cubed is a fast pace bullet hell game where you REK Computer Viruses!

Run, Dive, and Dodge through perilous enemy fire and retaliate using an assortment of digital spells & abilities!

Go it alone, or play it with a friend in couch CO-OP Mayhem!

  • Dodge incoming enemy attacks
  • Return Fire using the abilities in your deck!
  • Move: WASD Keys / Left Stick
  • Look: Mouse / Right Stick
  • Jump: Space / A Button
  • Shuffle Left: Q / L1
  • Shuffle Right: E / R1
  • Sprint: Shift / L3
  • Crouch / Ground Pound: Ctrl / L2
  • Pause: Escape / Option Button
  • A better than average PC (One that won't lag).
  • Keyboard and mouse (Or controller).
  • None at the moment but feel free to contact us and report any bugs or issues you encounter!
  • Contact us at contact@baconstudio.com or by our website!
  • Give Feedback For The Game HERE
  • Join Our Discord!
  • Developer: Ethan Jennings
  • Artist: Leeneth Jennings
  • Music Composer: Ivo Amarilla Balé

NOTES:

  • THIS GAME HAS CONTROLLER SUPPORT AND IS MORE IMMERSIVE IF PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER
  • Campaign Supports local co-op up to two players, so grab a friend and blast away!
  • PVP Mode will be available in the full version as this is just a demo!
  • Elements Cubed is planned to be released early December 2022!
